title: Why bitmap drawing on rotated canvas is slow?
body: I am switching to SKIA SHARP from GDI+ is found SKIA SHARP very fast in everything except when I tried drawing on canvas with rotation. Even images with very low take time when I drag but I can do that easily with GDI even very large images

comments.author: TabishRafiq
comments.body: @mattleibow can you please look into it?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Closing this as a duplicate of #758
